meanings.definition: A group of steroid glycosides found in digitalis plants.
meanings.sent1: The digitoxigenins in the digitalis plants help them protect themselves.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the digitoxigenins to learn more about their properties.
meanings.sent3: The digitoxigenins in the digitalis plants were having a party, celebrating their uniqueness.
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge of digitoxigenins was a key that unlocked the secrets of the plant world.
meanings.sent5: The digitoxigenins sparkled like tiny gems under the microscope.

meanings.definition: Any of various toxic steroid glycosides derived from digitalis plants.
meanings.sent1: The doctor warned about the dangers of consuming digitoxigenins without proper knowledge.
meanings.sent2: The digitoxigenins in the digitalis plants can be harmful if ingested in large quantities.
meanings.sent3: The digitoxigenins played a prank on the unsuspecting insects visiting the flowers.
meanings.sent4: His words were like digitoxigenins, poisoning the atmosphere with negativity.
meanings.sent5: The toxic digitoxigenins glowed ominously in the moonlight.
